SEARCH
Package bto.View

Class OfficerView

java.lang.Object
bto.View.UserView
bto.View.OfficerView
public class OfficerView extends UserView
The OfficerView class provides the user interface for officers to interact with the system. It allows officers to perform various actions such as viewing registration status, generating receipts, updating application statuses, and replying to enquiries.

      public OfficerView(Officer officer, OfficerController officerController, ApplicantController applicantController, ApplicantView applicantView)
      Constructs an OfficerView instance.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer currently logged in.
      officerController - The controller handling officer-related operations.
      applicantController - The controller handling applicant-related operations.
      applicantView - The view for applicant-related operations.
